text: A mayoral election was held on 7 April 2019 to elect the next Mayor of Osaka. == Candidates == *Ichiro Matsui, ex governor of Osaka prefecture for Nippon Ishin no Kai. *Akira Yanagimoto, City councillor back by LDP, Komeito, DPFP. == Results == http://shingetsunewsagency.com/2019/04/13/conservative- landslide-in-unified-local-elections/ == References == 2019 Category:2019 elections in Japan Category:Elections in Osaka Prefecture
title: 2019 Osaka mayoral election
